issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Issue when change template

Steps to reproduce
1. Click on one row => the template is changed => click on button Click me
2. Click another row => click on button Click me
3. Click another row

Expected: The button Click me on step 3 is visible
Issue: The button Click me on step 3 is hidden
fields.summary: iOS: ListView template item with button stops working after two clicks
fields.environment:
OS X 10.9.2
iOS Simulator 7.1
Titanium SDK 3.2.2

comments.body: Moving this ticket to engineering as I can reproduce this issue on iOS platform. Same test case works fine on Android platform.

Issue still exists with SDK Version 3.2.2 and 3.4.0

Titanium Command-Line Interface, 
CLI version 3.3.0, 
Titanium SDK version 3.2.2.GA 
Titanium SDK version 3.4.0.GA 
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.3.0.201407111535 
iOS SDK: 7.1
iOS iPhone Simulator: 7.1
